name: Wood
description:
The Evil Druid... no name!.. has invaded your woods and taken to animating your livelihood.  You, the brave woodcutter, must clear out these waves of enemies and take on the druids largest creation.  How long can you last?

JamGoJam - 10

Criteria

#1 Hack and Slash: This game puts you as a wood cutter pitted against the very wood you cut!  Charge up your dash to hack and slash your way through your opponents. 

#2 Nature: An evil Druid has animated the trees around you, making your life a living, woody, hell.

#3 Inertia: Dash forward through your enemies.  But calculate the amount of energy carefully.  Not enough and you wont have enough for your next dash.  Too little and you'll get stopped short surrounded by enemies. 

#4 Fanfare: There are trumpets and stuff... none of us are musicians.

Credits

Zook - Art, Animation, Level Design, Game Design, Controls

Imperial & Bountywolf - Programming ( GMS2 )

Retroplus - Custom sfx for us, ty!

Not Our Stuff!
All Music taken from internet.  All SFX taken from internet as well except for one fanfare piece. 

One art, boss tree, taken from free use site.  

All further assets, controls, concepts created by us during the jam.
